amendment.description: To modify the apportionment formula to ensure that the percentage of apportioned funds received by a State is the same as the percentage of total gas taxes paid by the State.

action.text: Amendment SA 1517 proposed by Senator Coats.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1517 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 70. Record Vote Number: 42.
